remarks.para: Collection Views allow content to be displayed using arbitrary layouts. Grid-like layouts can use the or application developers can subtype to create their own flexible pattern.
The layout of the s in a is controlled by a , which can be passed in to the C:UIKit.UICollectionView(UICollectionViewLayout) constructor or can changed with .
Application developers can create fully custom layouts by subclassing either or .
The key methods to override are:
